MemCapture_MCB gMemCaptureMCB
 Global Variable for tracking information required by the Capture Demo.
 

Detailed Description

Introduction

The DSS Memory Capture application is only responsible for the execution of the data path. It does not participate in any control activities. The mmWave module is executed in ISOLATION mode on the MSS.

Thus the DSS is responsible for loading of the Memory Capture Profile and the creation of the Test Framework Task on which context the profile is executed.

Configuration

The DSS does not have any configuration. The MSS is responsible for the configuration of the mmWave configuration

Start

The DSS simply receives the finalize configuration report from the MSS. It uses that configuration to start the profile and to be ready for the ADC data to arrive.

Typedef Documentation

typedef struct MemCapture_MCB_t MemCapture_MCB

Stream Demo Master Control Block.

The structure is used to hold all the relevant information for the Stream Demo.
